summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1766, for the improvement of Washington Boulevard from East Mercer Street to East Harrison Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 18665 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
